official_title: A bill relating to collective-bargaining representation of postal employees.

summary.text: Prohibits collective bargaining agreements between the United States Postal Service and labor organizations from containing procedures which would preclude employees from being represented in grievance and adverse actions arising under such agreements by representatives of their own choosing.

titles.title: A bill relating to collective-bargaining representation of postal employees.
